panels.title: Customer Count Evolution for "$loyProgram" for last $interval
Customer Daily Count for "$loyProgram" and Tier: $tier
Customer Daily Count per Tier for "$loyProgram"

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND filter.tierChangeType:$tierChangeType AND filter.previousTier:$previousTier AND filter.newTier:$newTier
filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND filter.tierChangeType:$tierChangeType AND filter.previousTier:$previousTier AND filter.newTier:$newTier

panels.title: Customer Count for "$loyProgram" and $tierChangeType from $previousTier to $newTier

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND filter.tierChangeType:$tierChangeType AND filter.previousTier:$previousTier AND filter.newTier:$newTier

panels.title: Tier Changes for "$loyProgram" by Tier Transition

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND (filter.tierChangeType:$downVar OR filter.tierChangeType:$upgradeVar) AND filter.previousTier:$previousTier AND filter.newTier:$newTier

panels.title: Upgrade and Downgrade Daily Count for "$loyProgram" from $previousTier to $newTier

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND (NOT(filter.tierChangeType:$downVar OR filter.tierChangeType:$upgradeVar)) AND filter.tierChangeType:$tierChangeType AND filter.previousTier:$previousTier AND filter.newTier:$newTier

panels.title: Opt-in and Opt-out Daily Count for "$loyProgram" from $previousTier to $newTier
Point Daily Count by Sales Channel
Customer Daily Count per Tier for "$subscrStatus" status for Program "$loyProgram"
Customer Daily Count per Tier for "$subscrStatus" status for "$loyProgram"
